DOC.detailed_description: There five different age group ( 18~55 years/7~17 years/1~6 years/7~10 months/2 month ) , group 40 people divide two subgroup . Each subgroup inject different vaccine ( MCV4 4μg , MCV4 8μg ) .For 7~10 month & 2 month age group , 2 & 3 injection seperately . Each injection interval 1 month . After 7 day observation 1 dose immunization Group 18-55 year old adult , serious adverse event associate vaccine , severe adverse reaction rate le 10 % , 7 17 year old 1 6 year old age group continue inoculate order . After first dose 7~10 month group evaluate safety , 2 month group immunize first dose . All participant complete immune procedure , observe safety 30 day whole immunization . Data collection : Subjects complete diary card , researcher collect original data fill case report form data entry statistical analysis .
